data.comment: The match is underway at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 1, Ryo Nagai for the away team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Valdo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 10, Free kick in a good position for Hiroshima!
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 12, Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Tsukasa Morishima.
Shimizu's Valdo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 16, Hiroshima are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tsukasa Morishima of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 26, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Attention is being given to Hiroshimaâ€™s Ryo Nagai and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 28, Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) has replaced the possibly injured Ryo Nagai.
In Shizuoka Hiroshima attack through Yuki Nogami. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Shimizu.
Hiroshima's Shunki Higashi breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 36, Shimizu pushes forward through Kenta Nishizawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Yasufumi Nishimura (Shimizu) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Hiroshima at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In Shizuoka, Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 44, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tadashi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
At IAI Stadium Nihondaira the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Hiroshima drive forward but Tsukasa Morishima is judged offside.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Shizuoka.
Junior Dutra is booked for the home team.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Ryo Okui is replacing Elsinho for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Douglas Vieira with Leandro Pereira.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 49, Goal! Shimizu go level at 1-1 through Junior Dutra in Shizuoka.
Great play from Mitsunari Musaka to set up the goal.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 51, Goal! Leandro Pereira gives Hiroshima a 1-2 lead.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Junior Dutra's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a third substitution, with Yuya Asano replacing Kosei Shibasaki.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Yoshifumi Kashiwa replacing Yusuke Chajima.
In the minute 55, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 60, Junior Dutra (Shimizu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Yusuke Goto is replacing Yosuke Kawai for the home team.
In the minute 63, Tadashi Nakamura waits before resuming play because Kodai Dohi for Hiroshima is still down.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a fifth change, with Toshihiro Aoyama replacing the possibly injured Kodai Dohi.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 64, Tadashi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima drives forward and Yuya Asano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Tadashi Nakamura awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Free kick Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Great finish from Hayao Kawabe to give Hiroshima a 1-3 lead.
In the minute 75, Yuya Asano instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 79, Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Renato Augusto (Shimizu) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Yasufumi Nishimura with Hikaru Naruoka. This is the third substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 85, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yusuke Goto (Shimizu) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-3 at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Ryo Okui with an assist there.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Shimizu.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Shimizu are on the attack at IAI Stadium Nihondaira, where Yusuke Goto is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Tadashi Nakamura blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's fourth substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Shota Kaneko replacing Kenta Nishizawa.
